meanings.definition: A set of three associated artistic, literary, or musical works intended to be appreciated together.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a beautiful triptyca of paintings by the famous artist.
meanings.sent2: She bought a triptyca of novels by her favorite author to read over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The triptyca of songs on the album were like a journey through different emotions.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a triptyca of chapters, each one representing a different phase.
meanings.sent5: The triptyca of sculptures in the park told a story of love, loss, and hope.

meanings.definition: A set of three panels or compartments side by side, bearing pictures or carvings.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a stunning triptyca of landscapes to hang in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The antique cabinet had a triptyca of intricate carvings on its doors.
meanings.sent3: The triptyca of family photos on the wall captured special moments over the years.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box had a triptyca of small mirrors, each one reflecting a different angle.
meanings.sent5: The triptyca of stained glass windows in the church depicted scenes from the Bible.
